channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Fineract
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Fineract

item.title: CVE-2023-25196|2024-08-02T11:18:36.263Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20fineract
item.description:
Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache Fineract. Authorized users may be able to change or add data in certain components.
This issue affects Apache Fineract: from 1.4 through 1.8.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-25195|2024-08-02T11:18:36.247Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20fineract
item.description:
Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache Fineract. Authorized users with limited permissions can gain access to server and may be able to use server for any outbound traffic.
This issue affects Apache Fineract: from 1.4 through 1.8.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-25197|2024-08-02T11:18:36.121Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20fineract
item.description:
Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation apache fineract. Authorized users may be able to exploit this for limited impact on components.
This issue affects apache fineract: from 1.4 through 1.8.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-23537|2024-03-29T14:38:05.738Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20fineract
item.description:
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Apache Fineract.This issue affects Apache Fineract: <1.8.5.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.9.0, which fixes the issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-23538|2024-03-29T14:37:40.374Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20fineract
item.description:
Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Apache Fineract.This issue affects Apache Fineract: <1.8.5.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.8.5 or 1.9.0, which fix the issue.

Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.8.5 or 1.9.0, which fix the issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-23537|2024-07-08T20:06:52.390Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20fineract
